content.question:
Â© Culture Club/Getty Images

In the Etruscan sarcophagus shown, the reclining figures on the lid are presented through the use of

choices.label: molded plaster embedded with small tesserae
low-relief carved marble stained with natural dyes
high-relief modeled clay painted with polychrome accents
shaped limestone glazed with tinted animal-hide glue

content.answer: high-relief modeled clay painted with polychrome accents

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art) beyond the image set, including-  a. form.  b.  Style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
